import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class Signup extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { uname: '', email: '', phone: '' } } //name-input-text-box unameHandling = (e) => { this.setState({ uname: e.target.value }) } render() { //Destructuring.... var {uname,email,phone}=this.state return (<>

Registration Form

{uname}

) } }
